text: Podhruška (; in older sources also Podhruško,Leksikon občin kraljestev in dežel zastopanih v državnem zboru, vol. 6: Kranjsko. 1906. Vienna: C. Kr. Dvorna in Državna Tiskarna, p. 28. ) is a settlement on the Nevljica River at the Kamnik end of the Tuhinj Valley in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. ==References== ==External links== *Podhruška at Geopedia * Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Podhruška
